title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: PSF toolkit provides functions interactive apps calculate topology-aware pathway activity expression fold-change data, visualize KEGG pathways, run partial influence analysis, generate reports. vignette demonstrates common workflows usage main public APIs.

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
PSF toolkit: Getting Started
code: library(psf)  # Load example expression matrix (Entrez IDs as rownames) and curated pathway collection load(system.file("extdata", "melanoma_exp.RData", package = "psf")) load(system.file("extdata", "kegg_curated_40_signalings.RData", package = "psf"))  # Fold-change vs global mean melanoma_fc <- (melanoma_deseq_normalized_counts + 1) / rowMeans(melanoma_deseq_normalized_counts + 1)  # Run PSF across all pathways and samples psf_list <- run_psf(entrez.fc = melanoma_fc,                     kegg.collection = kegg_curated_40_signalings,                     calculate.significance = FALSE,                     ncores = 1)  # Visualize a pathway (image-based) with PSF coloring and sink plots plot_pathway(psf_list$PI3K_Akt_signaling_pathway,              plot_type = "kegg",              color_nodes = "psf_activities",              sample_id = "mean",              log_norm = TRUE,              plot_sink_values = TRUE,              use_old_images = TRUE)  # Generate PDF reports per pathway generate_psf_report(psf_list = psf_list,                     folder_name = "example_psf_report",                     plot_type = "kegg",                     log_norm = TRUE,                     use_old_images = TRUE)

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: download.KGML(id, dir): Download KEGG KGML file pathway id dir. parse.KGML(kgml): Parse KGML graphNEL-based pathway. generate.kegg.collection(pathway.id.list, .dir, sink.nodes = TRUE): Download parse vector KEGG IDs. generate.kegg.collection..kgml(kgml.files, sink.nodes = TRUE): Parse set local KGML files.
code: ids <- c("hsa04151", "hsa04010") col <- generate.kegg.collection(ids, out.dir = tempdir(), sink.nodes = TRUE) length(col)

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: run_psf(entrez.fc, kegg.collection, ...): Main engine. Returns list pathway objects PSF matrices metadata. psf..env.entrez.fc(entrez.fc, kegg.collection, ...): Alternative PSF runner options significance mapping control. process.psf.results(psf.results): Add summary stats p-values bootstrapping used. calc_node_partial_influences(pathway, ...) run_pi(pathway, ...): Partial influence analysis rank nodes effect target sink(s).
code: # Partial influence for one sample, top drivers of specific sink pw <- psf_list$PI3K_Akt_signaling_pathway pi <- run_pi(pathway = pw,              influenced_node = pw$sink.nodes[1],              influence_direction = "any",              sample_id = "mean",              node_combinations = 1,              ncores = 1) head(pi$ordered_influence_nodes)

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: plot_pathway(pathway, plot_type = c("kegg", "visnet"), ...): Visualize KEGG image-based interactive network coloring PSF FC. plot_kegg_image_pathway(pathway, ...): Lower-level KEGG image drawer. plot_tmm_pathway(pathway, ...): Visualize TMM pathway network layout.
code: # Interactive network view with PSF coloring plot_pathway(psf_list$PI3K_Akt_signaling_pathway,              plot_type = "visnet",              color_nodes = "psf_activities",              sample_id = "mean")

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: generate_psf_report(psf_list, folder_name, ...): Creates PDF reports per pathway KEGG panel sink summaries. calc_psf_and_generate_report_from_collection(...): Convenience function compute PSF KEGG collection produce PDFs.

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: spatial_psf_analysis(spatial_obj, pathway_collection, gene_symbol_to_entrez, ...): Runs PSF spatial data returns objects usable spatial browser. run_psf_spatial_browser(psf_spatial_results): Launch Shiny browser spatial PSF.
code: library(Seurat) # Load a Seurat object and mapping # spatial_melanoma <- Load10X_Spatial("/path/to/data") load(system.file("extdata", "kegg_curated_40_signalings.RData", package="psf")) load(system.file("extdata", "gene_symbol_to_entrez.RData", package="psf"))  # res <- spatial_psf_analysis(spatial_melanoma, kegg_curated_40_signalings, gene_symbol_to_entrez) # run_psf_spatial_browser(res)

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: run_shiny_app(port = 3838): Main KEGG editor visualization app. pathway_shiny_vis(pathway, port = 3838): Visualize single pathway interactively.

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: graphnel_to_df(pathway, extended = TRUE): Convert node/edge data frames. df_to_graphnel(node_table, edge_table): Build graphNEL tables. update_edge_weights(edge_weights, g): Replace edge weights graph.
code: pw <- psf_list$PI3K_Akt_signaling_pathway dfs <- graphnel_to_df(pw, extended = TRUE) head(dfs$node_table)

title: PSF toolkit: Getting Started
text: Provide FC matrices NAs zeros. Use tmm_mode tmm_update_mode switches TMM-specific pathways. heavy computations, increase ncores avoid calculate.significance = TRUE unless required.

title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
text: PSF Toolkit R package developed topology-aware (TA) pathway analysis various types omics data. package includes interactive modules pathway editing visualization, facilitating pathway curation results interpretation. Website: https://hakobyansiras.github.io/PSFC Get started: see Articles tab website.

title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
text: Note: Due potential network issues GitHub servers, package download may take longer expected. encounter timeout errors, try increasing timeout limit using:

what: Running the Shiny App for Pathway Curation and Visualization
title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
text: PSF Toolkit includes Shiny app interactive pathway curation visualization. detailed tutorial pathway import, curation, analysis available website.

title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
code: # Install development dependencies install.packages(c("roxygen2", "pkgdown"), repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")  # Generate Rd files (optional, already present) roxygen2::roxygenise()  # Build site into docs/ pkgdown::build_site()

what: Running PSF on Bulk RNA-seq Data with 40 Curated KEGG Signaling Pathways
title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
code: library(psf)  # Load melanoma DESeq2 normalized expression data (GSE112509) load(system.file("extdata", "melanoma_exp.RData", package="psf"))  # Load curated KEGG pathway collection load(system.file("extdata", "kegg_curated_40_signalings.RData", package="psf"))  # Calculate fold change (FC) values against the global mean melanoma_fc <- (melanoma_deseq_normalized_counts + 1) / rowMeans(melanoma_deseq_normalized_counts + 1)  # Run PSF analysis on 40 pathways for all samples melanoma_psf <- run_psf(entrez.fc = melanoma_fc, kegg.collection = kegg_curated_40_signalings,                          calculate.significance = FALSE, ncores = 4)  # Plot KEGG image-based PI3K-Akt signaling pathway with color-coded nodes plot_pathway(melanoma_psf$PI3K_Akt_signaling_pathway, plot_type = "kegg",               color_nodes = "psf_activities", sample_id = "mean", log_norm = TRUE,               plot_sink_values = TRUE, use_old_images = TRUE)  # Generate PDF reports for PSF-analyzed pathways generate_psf_report(psf_list = melanoma_psf, folder_name = "example_psf_report",                      plot_type = "kegg", log_norm = TRUE, use_old_images = TRUE)

what: Running PSF on Spatial Transcriptomics Data
title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
text: Important: Due installation issues Seurat package, included Suggests rather Imports. PSF package still install even Seurat fails install. However, must manually install Seurat perform spatial transcriptomic analyses.
code: library(psf) library(Seurat)  # Load the spatial dataset. The human melanoma dataset can be downloaded from the following link: https://www.10xgenomics.com/datasets/human-melanoma-if-stained-ffpe-2-standard. To import the data into Seurat, please download the Feature / barcode matrix HDF5 (filtered) and the Spatial imaging data files. spatial_melanoma <- Load10X_Spatial("/path/to/spatial_dataset",                                      filename = "CytAssist_FFPE_Human_Skin_Melanoma_filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5")  # Load pre-downloaded gene symbol to Entrez ID conversion data load(system.file("extdata", "gene_symbol_to_entrez.RData", package="psf"))  # Load curated KEGG signaling pathways load(system.file("extdata", "kegg_curated_40_signalings.RData", package="psf")) load(system.file("extdata", "kegg_sink_to_process.RData", package="psf"))  # Run pathway analysis psf_spatial <- spatial_psf_analysis(spatial_obj = spatial_melanoma,                                      pathway_collection = kegg_curated_40_signalings,                                      gene_symbol_to_entrez = gene_symbol_to_entrez, nthreads = 1)  # Launch the PSF spatial browser application run_psf_spatial_browser(psf_spatial_results = psf_spatial)

previous_headings: Running PSF on Spatial Transcriptomics Data
title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
text: short demo video demonstrating PSF spatial browser available: PSF Spatial Browser Demo can also explore demo Shiny app: PSF Spatial Browser app includes dedicated Help tab containing detailed instructions use .

what: Running PSF on Telomere Maintenance Mechanism (TMM) Pathways
title: PSF: Pathway Signal Flow Calculator
text: details, please refer package documentation tutorials.
code: library(psf)  # Load melanoma DESeq2 normalized expression data load(system.file("extdata", "melanoma_exp.RData", package="psf"))  # Load TMM pathway load(system.file("extdata", "tmm_pathway.RData", package="psf"))  # Calculate fold change (FC) values against the global mean melanoma_fc <- (melanoma_deseq_normalized_counts + 1) / rowMeans(melanoma_deseq_normalized_counts + 1)  # Run PSF analysis on the TMM pathway for all samples psf_tmm_result_mel <- psf.from.env.entrez.fc(entrez.fc = melanoma_fc,                                              kegg.collection = tmm_pathway,                                               calculate.significance = FALSE, sum = FALSE, split = FALSE,                                               return_only_signals = FALSE, tmm_mode = TRUE, tmm_updated_mode = TRUE)  # Plot the TMM pathway for a sample plot_tmm_pathway(pathway = psf_tmm_result_mel$X031$tmm, no_color_mode = FALSE,                  mapping_data_type = "signal", log_norm = FALSE, layout = "layout_nicely")

what: Returns ordered list of the nodes by their influence on the signal of specified nodes. — calc_node_partial_influences
title: Returns ordered list of the nodes by their influence on the signal of specified nodes. — calc_node_partial_influences
text: Returns ordered list nodes influence signal specified nodes.

title: Returns ordered list of the nodes by their influence on the signal of specified nodes. — calc_node_partial_influences
code: calc_node_partial_influences(   pathway,   exp_fc_matrix = NULL,   influenced_node,   influence_direction = "any",   node_combinations = 1,   nproc = 1,   get_influence_matrix = FALSE )

title: Returns ordered list of the nodes by their influence on the signal of specified nodes. — calc_node_partial_influences
text: pathway Pathway onbject. exp_fc_matrix expression fold change matrix gene etrez id rownames. influenced_node sigle id node vector node ids based partial influencse calculated. influence_direction direction node affects signal target node. Possible values c("+", "-", ""). Default value "". node_combinations number node combinations partial influence analysis. Note: number PSF calculations increases exponent combinations(N nodes^combinations). Default value 1. nproc number cpus use calculation. Default value 1. get_influence_matrix set true influence matrix returned instead influencial nodes. column influence matrix represent log ratio default neutralized node(s) psf profile.

what: Calculates psf for given kegg pathway based on expression matrix and generates pdf report with colored pathways and plots — calc_psf_and_generate_report_from_collection
title: Calculates psf for given kegg pathway based on expression matrix and generates pdf report with colored pathways and plots — calc_psf_and_generate_report_from_collection
text: Calculates psf given kegg pathway based expression matrix generates pdf report colored pathways plots

title: Calculates psf for given kegg pathway based on expression matrix and generates pdf report with colored pathways and plots — calc_psf_and_generate_report_from_collection
code: calc_psf_and_generate_report_from_collection(   kegg_collection,   exp_matrix,   folder_name,   calculate_significance = FALSE,   use_old_images = F,   coldata = NULL,   adj = c(0.48, 1) )

title: Calculates psf for given kegg pathway based on expression matrix and generates pdf report with colored pathways and plots — calc_psf_and_generate_report_from_collection
text: kegg_collection list kegg pathways exp_matrix expression fold change matrix gene entrez id rownames folder_name name folder pdf report(s) generated calculate_significance logical, true psf function also calculate significance PSF values shuffling network nodes checking resulted PSF values calculated chance. set true volcano plot generetaed pdf report. use_old_images use olde kegg images(use curated pathway collection) coldata table sample information first column table corresponds colnames exp_matrix second column group information. adj two values 0 1 specify x y adjustment node labels, 0 left/bottom, 1 right/top, 0.5 centered. Default value c(0.48, 1). devices values outside 0 1 also work.

title: Calculates PSF formulas for each node in graphNEL object. — eval_formulas
code: eval_formulas(   g,   node.ordering,   sink.nodes,   split = TRUE,   sum = FALSE,   tmm_mode = FALSE,   tmm_update_mode = FALSE )

title: Calculates PSF formulas for each node in graphNEL object. — eval_formulas
text: g graphNEL pathway object. node.ordering order nodes calculated order.nodes function. sink.nodes list terminal (sink) nodes calculated determine.sink.nodes function. split logical, true incoming signal proportionally splitted among edges. sum logical, default value FALSE. set true pathway activity formulas calculated via addition, set false activity formulas calculated via multiplication. tmm_mode set true specific PSF configuration used calculation pathway activity formulas described https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2021.662464/full tmm_update_mode set true specific PSF configuration used calculation pathway activity formulas described https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2021.662464/full

title: Generates pdf report with colored pathways and plots — generate_psf_report
text: psf_list Output run_psf function folder_name name folder pdf report(s) generated plot_type Pathway visualization type. Possible values c("kegg", "visnet"). Default value "kegg". log_norm log transform PSF values color mapping. Default value TRUE. y_adj_text Numeric value adjust Y position node labels. Depending R version value adjusted accurate text alignment. Default value 0. y_adj_sink Numeric value adjust Y position sink node sign labels. Depending R version value adjusted accurate alignment. Default value 0. use_old_images use olde kegg images(use curated pathway collection)

title: Plots the pathway with colored nodes and labels — plot_kegg_image_pathway
code: plot_kegg_image_pathway(   pathway,   no_color_mode = T,   mapping_data_type = "signal",   log_norm = TRUE,   use_old_images = FALSE,   plot_type = "kegg",   highlight_nodes = NULL,   highlight_color = "red",   adj = c(0.48, 1),   y_adj_text = 0,   y_adj_sink = 0 )

title: Plots the pathway with colored nodes and labels — plot_kegg_image_pathway
text: pathway list object kegg collection no_color_mode set FALSE pathway nodes color coded log expression FC values log PSF values color legend added pathway plot. Default value TRUE mapping_data_type type node values bi visualized. Possible values c("signal", "exp"). log_norm log transform PSF expression values color mapping. Default value TRUE use_old_images use_old_images use olde kegg images(use curated pathway collection). plot_type network visualization type. Possible values c("kegg", "visnet"). kegg option used bathway plotted kegg png image. visnet option function plot interactive network kegg layou. highlight_nodes single value node id vector ids highlighted plotted pathway. Default value NULL highlight_color Highlighed nodes color(s). Default values "red" adj two values 0 1 specify x y adjustment node labels, 0 left/bottom, 1 right/top, 0.5 centered. Default value c(0.48, 1). devices values outside 0 1 also work. applicable KEGG visualization type. y_adj_text Numeric value adjust Y position node labels. Depending R version value adjusted accurate text alignment. Default value 0. y_adj_sink Numeric value adjust Y position sink node sign labels. Depending R version value adjusted accurate alignment. Default value 0.

title: Plots the pathway with colored nodes and labels — plot_pathway
text: Plots pathway colored nodes labels

title: Plots the pathway with colored nodes and labels — plot_pathway
code: plot_pathway(   pathway,   plot_type = "visnet",   plot_layout = NULL,   color_nodes = NULL,   multi_color_nodes = FALSE,   sample_id = "mean",   col_data = NULL,   log_norm = T,   highlight_nodes = NULL,   highlight_color = "red",   plot_sink_values = F,   y_adj_text = 0,   y_adj_sink = 0,   use_old_images = F )

title: Plots the pathway with colored nodes and labels — plot_pathway
text: pathway pathway object. plot_type network visualization type. Possible values c("kegg", "visnet"). "kegg" option used pathway plotted kegg png image. "visnet" option, function plot interactive network. plot_layout layout type pathway. works visnet plot_type. Default value NULL. Available values c("layout_nicely"). color_nodes type node values visualized. value type specified pathway nodes color coded expression FC values PSF values color legend added pathway plot. Possible values c(NULL, "psf_activities", "exp_fc"). Default value NULL. multi_color_nodes set true nodes pathway colored multiple colors based provided sample vector groups (maximum number 4). Available kegg visualization. sample_id name character vector samples used visualize psf exp fc values pathway. get averaged values across samples, set value "mean". Default value "mean". col_data sample information calculated PSF activities. data.frame two columns, first column sample ids (colnames PSF activity matrix), second column group names. Default value NULL. data.frame group information provided plot_pathway generate boxplots sink values group righ side pathway. log_norm log transform PSF expression values color mapping. Default value TRUE. highlight_nodes single value node id vector ids highlighted plotted pathway. Default value NULL. highlight_color Highlighted nodes color(s). Default values "red". plot_sink_values set TRUE pathway activity values terminal (sink) nodes plotted right side pathway (boxplots multiple samples, barplot single sample). Default value FALSE. y_adj_text Numeric value adjust Y position node labels. Depending R version value adjusted accurate text alignment. Default value 0. y_adj_sink Numeric value adjust Y position sink node sign labels. Depending R version value adjusted accurate alignment. Default value 0. use_old_images use old kegg images(use curated pathway collection). Default value FALSE.

title: Plots the TMM pathway with colored nodes and labels with interactive network. — plot_tmm_pathway
text: pathway pathway object. no_color_mode whetherto colorcode nodes based node values . Default value FALSE. mapping_data_type type node values visualized. value type specified pathway nodes color coded expression FC values PSF values color legend added pathway plot. Possible values c(NULL, "signal", "exp_fc"). Default value signal. log_norm log transform PSF expression values color mapping. Default value TRUE. layout layout type pathway. Default value layout_nicely. Available values c("layout_nicely").

title: Calculates pathway activity with PSF algorithm for provided kegg collection based on expression fold change data. — psf.from.env.entrez.fc
code: psf.from.env.entrez.fc(   entrez.fc,   kegg.collection,   split = TRUE,   calculate.significance = T,   bst.steps = 200,   sum = FALSE,   map_exp_data = TRUE,   return_only_signals = FALSE,   tmm_mode = FALSE,   tmm_updated_mode = FALSE )

title: Calculates pathway activity with PSF algorithm for provided kegg collection based on expression fold change data. — psf.from.env.entrez.fc
text: entrez.fc expression fold change matrix gene etrez id rownames. kegg.collection list kegg pathways generated generate.kegg.collection..kgml generate.kegg.collection function. split logical, true incoming signal proportionally splitted among edges. calculate.significance logical, true function also calculate significance PSF values shuffling network nodes checking resulted PSF values calculated chance. bst.steps integer, number interations shuffling recalculating PSF values significance analysis. sum logical, default value FALSE. set true pathway activity caculated via addition, set false activity willbe calculated via multiplication. map_exp_data logical, default value TRUE. set false expression data mapped pathway nodes pathway node expression values used instead. return_only_signals logical, default value FALSE. set true PSF values pathway nodes retruned results. Set TRUE analyzing large datasets reduce size output file. tmm_mode set true specific PSF configuration used pathway activity calculation described https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2021.662464/full tmm_updated_mode set true specific PSF configuration used pathway activity calculation described https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2021.662464/full

what: Performs partial influence analysis which evaluates effect of each pathway node on specific node(s) of the pathway. — run_pi
title: Performs partial influence analysis which evaluates effect of each pathway node on specific node(s) of the pathway. — run_pi
text: Performs partial influence analysis evaluates effect pathway node specific node(s) pathway.

title: Performs partial influence analysis which evaluates effect of each pathway node on specific node(s) of the pathway. — run_pi
code: run_pi(   pathway,   influenced_node,   influence_direction = "any",   sample_id = "all",   node_combinations = 1,   get_influence_matrix = FALSE,   ncores = 1 )

title: Performs partial influence analysis which evaluates effect of each pathway node on specific node(s) of the pathway. — run_pi
text: pathway Pathway object calculated PSF activities run_psf function. influenced_node single id node vector node ids based partial influence calculated. influence_direction direction node affects signal target node(s). Possible values c("+", "-", ""). Default value "". sample_id sample id vector sample ids partial influence calculated. Default value "". node_combinations number node combinations partial influence analysis. Note: number PSF calculations increases exponent combinations(N nodes^combinations). Default value 1. get_influence_matrix set true influence matrix returned instead influential nodes. column influence matrix represent log ratio default neutralized node(s) psf profile. ncores integer, number CPUs use calculation. Default value 1.

title: Performs partial influence analysis which evaluates effect of each pathway node on specific node(s) of the pathway. — run_pi
text: Returns list 2 objects. "ordered_influence_nodes" matrix ordered nodes based influence column correspond one sample. "mean_influence_params" dataframe mean influence parameters node (NULL analysis performed 1 sample).

text: Calculates pathway activity PSF algorithm provided kegg collection based expression fold change data.

title: Calculates pathway activity with PSF algorithm for provided kegg collection based on expression fold change data. — run_psf
code: run_psf(   entrez.fc,   kegg.collection,   calculate.significance = F,   bst.steps = 200,   shuffling_mode = "global",   sum = FALSE,   split = TRUE,   tmm_mode = FALSE,   tmm_update_mode = FALSE,   ncores = 1 )

title: Calculates pathway activity with PSF algorithm for provided kegg collection based on expression fold change data. — run_psf
text: entrez.fc expression fold change matrix gene etrez id rownames. kegg.collection list kegg pathways generated generate.kegg.collection..kgml generate.kegg.collection function. calculate.significance logical, true function also calculate significance PSF values shuffling network nodes checking resulted PSF values calculated chance. bst.steps integer, number iterations shuffling recalculating PSF values significance analysis. shuffling_mode character, default value "global". argument set genes selected bootstrapping. set "global" provided FC values used generate random FC values pathway. set "local" FC values pathway genes shuffled time used. sum logical, default value FALSE. set true pathway activity calculated via addition, set false activity calculated via multiplication. split logical, true incoming signal proportionally spitted among edges. tmm_mode logical, default value FALSE. set true specific PSF configuration used pathway activity calculation described https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2021.662464/full tmm_update_mode logical, default value FALSE. set true specific PSF configuration used pathway activity calculation described https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2021.662464/full ncores integer, number CPUs use PSF calculation. Default value 1.

title: Calculates pathway activity with PSF algorithm for provided kegg collection based on expression fold change data. — run_psf
text: Kegg collection list evaluated PSF formulas, calculated PSF values significance values. object list corresponds one pathway "psf_activities", "p_val_mat", "exp_fc" matrices added (column matrix one sample). list object can used pathway visualization PSF report generation.
